Body.Content:
Updated February 25, 2024: We have updated the rollout timeline below. Thank you for your patience.

Users can now share the contact information of someone who is not in a chat to make it easy for others to confidently get to know other collaborators.

This message is associated with Microsoft 365 Roadmap ID 375627

[When this will happen:]

Targeted Release: We will begin rolling out mid-January 2024 and expect to complete by late January 2024.

Worldwide, GCC, GCC High & DoD: We will begin rolling out early February 2024 and expect to complete by mid-March 2024 (previously mid-February).

[How this will affect your organization:]

Users can now easily share contact information in group chats.


[What you need to do to prepare:]

You may consider updating your internal documentation.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: Microsoft Teams now allows users to share contact information of someone who is not in a chat, making it easier for others to get to know other collaborators. The rollout will begin mid-January 2024 and complete by late January 2024 for Targeted Release, and early February 2024 to mid-March 2024 for Worldwide, GCC, GCC High & DoD. No preparation is necessary, but internal documentation can be updated.

Details.Name: Summary
Details.Value: Microsoft Teams now allows users to share contact information of someone who is not in a chat, making it easier for others to get to know other collaborators. The rollout will begin mid-January 2024 and complete by late January 2024 for Targeted Release, and early February 2024 to mid-March 2024 for Worldwide, GCC, GCC High & DoD. No preparation is necessary, but internal documentation can be updated.

Title: (Updated) Microsoft Teams: Share contact information of people in Microsoft Teams chat
